entry.title: Fucks Given
entry.content:
Mit Fucks Given kannst du die Dinge festhalten, die dich beschÃ¤ftigt haben. Wann immer etwas passiert, Ã¼ber das du dir unnÃ¶tigerweise Gedanken machst, kannst du es mit einem Fingertipp notieren. Die App erstellt eine Ãœbersicht darÃ¼ber, wie viele Ficks du gegeben hast, damit du daran arbeiten kannst, keine mehr zu geben.
;
;Fucks Given ermÃ¶glicht es Ihnen, Ihre Daten zu sichern und hat einen schÃ¶nen dunklen Modus, der sich automatisch einschalten kann und dem Systemthema folgt.
;
;Webseite: ;https://www.crazymarvin.com/fucks-given;
;Helfe bei der Ãœbersetzung: ;https://hosted.weblate.org/engage/fucks-given/;
;Verbessere den Code: ;https://github.com/Crazy-Marvin/FucksGiven;
;
entry.summary: ï»¿Self-love is the greatest middle finger of all time.

entry.title: DigiAgriApp
entry.content:
;DigiAgriApp; is a Free and Open Source Software solution aimed at farmers and anyone with cultivated land. ;DigiAgriApp; is able to save the operations carried out in the field and all the data from different devices (mobile phones, weather stations, remotes such as drones or satellites) in a capillary manner, from the field to the individual plant.
;
;Read more about DigiAgriApp on
;
  • ;;documentations;
    ;
  • ;;presentations;
    ;
entry.summary: DigiAgriApp is a software aimed at farmers and anyone with cultivated land

entry.title: ActivityWatch
entry.content:
ActivityWatch is an open-source cross-platform application that tracks how you spend time on your devices, and keeps you in control of your data.
;
;It is the same ActivityWatch you know and love, but for Android! It builds on the same core as the desktop version, enabling us to offer the same features whichever platform you are on.
;
;Note about accessibility permission: the app allows users to optionally grant the accessibility permission to enable collection of browsing history, by tracking URLs from supported browsers.
;
;You can report issues and view the source code on GitHub: https://github.com/ActivityWatch/aw-android
;
entry.summary: Track how you spend your time on your devices.

entry.title: NeatLauncher
entry.content:
Die neue Start-App (der Launcher) Deines Android-GerÃ¤ts ersetzt hÃ¤ssliche Start-Apps, die zu bunt, grell, ablenkend, verwirrend, ineffizient und voller unsinniger Icons sind.
;
;Sorgt fÃ¼r Ãœbersichtlichkeit durch minimalistisches, effizientes und elegantes Design auf Textbasis. ErmÃ¶glicht die Konfiguration des Schnellzugriffs auf Apps, VerknÃ¼pfungen oder Kontakte auf verschiedene Weise (einschlieÃŸlich Gesten), und entfernt verwirrende Dinge vom Startbildschirm.
;
;UnterstÃ¼tzt VerknÃ¼pfungen, integriert die Kontaktliste (falls gewÃ¼nscht) und die Suchfunktion enthÃ¤lt eine konfigurierbare Websuche.
;
;FÃ¼r Benutzer, die Ãœbersichtlichkeit und geradliniges Design schÃ¤tzen.
;
;Bietet genug Konfigurierbarkeit, aber ohne das Testen von SonderfÃ¤llen mÃ¼hsam zu machen, so daÃŸ FunktionalitÃ¤t und Robustheit gewÃ¤hrleistet werden kÃ¶nnen.
;
;Neue App von Grund auf neuentwickelt.
;
;Inspiriert von Unlauncher (einem Fork von Slimlauncher) und Nolauncher sowie von Benutzerfeedback.
;
;Features:
;
; - einheitliches und elegantes textgestÃ¼tztes Design
; - konfigurierbare Schnellzugriffslinks und Gesten auf dem Startbildschirm
; - UnterstÃ¼tzung fÃ¼r VerknÃ¼pfungen (standardmÃ¤ÃŸig langer Klick auf App)
; - Apps ausblenden/anzeigen (bleiben aber durchsuchbar)
; - Apps kÃ¶nnen umbenannt werden (im Launcher)
; - Kontaktliste in Suche integriert
; - integrierte, konfigurierbare Websuche
; - mehrere Uhroptionen
; - Datumsformatoptionen
; - konfigurierbares Farbschema
; - kann Standardhintergrundbild benutzen
; - freie Open-Source-Software
; - keine UnterstÃ¼tzung fÃ¼r Icon-Sets (nicht erforderlich: es gibt keine Symbole)
; - keine Widget-UnterstÃ¼tzung
;
;
entry.summary: A neat and convenient launcher without icons.

entry.title: HabsGleich
entry.content:
HabsGleich soll es ermÃ¶glichen, kleine Ã„nderungen in der eigenen GedÃ¤chtnisleistung zu bemerken ohne dabei auf unpersÃ¶nliche Test (z.B. Memoryspiel) zurÃ¼ckzugreifen oder sensible persÃ¶nliche Daten an zentrale Server zu senden.
;
;Dazu soll der Nutzer zunÃ¤chst eigene Erlebnisse in das Tagebuch eintragen. Die Auswahl und Niederlegung dieser Ereignisse sollte optimalerweise Ã¼ber lange Zeit nach konsistenten Kriterien und in Ã¤hnlicher sprachlicher Ausformulierung geschehen.
;
;Die App wÃ¤hlt dann nach gewisser Zeit Ereignisse fÃ¼r den GedÃ¤chtnistest aus. Die Auswahl adaptiert sich in AbhÃ¤ngigkeit der Erinnerungsleistung des Nutzers so, dass Testereignisse stets in der NÃ¤he des zeitlichen Abstands ausgewÃ¤hlt werden, in dem der Nutzer noch gute Ergebnisse erzielt.
;
;Aus diesen Testergebnissen berechnet die App einen numerischen "Mind Index". Der sagt in etwa aus, in welchem zeitlichen Abstand die Erinnerung des Nutzers beginnt schlechter zu werden.
;
;Die Entwicklung dieses Mind Index kann auf der Statistikseite zeitlich nachverfolgt werden.
;
;Der Nutzer kann auf der Tagebuchseite seine Erlebnisse durchsuchen, bearbeiten und lÃ¶schen.
;
;Einige Screenshots zeigen Zitate von Henry David Thoreau.
;
entry.summary: HabsGleich is a mini diary with a mind test included.

entry.title: Grit
entry.content:
Grit is a ToDo List and habit tracker app that lets you visualise your progress
;
;Features
;- ToDo List with auto purge
;- Habit tracker with scheduled notifications
;- Habit map to visualise progress
;- Material3 theme and look
;
entry.summary: A ToDo List and Habit Tracker app that helps you visualise your progress

entry.title: E6B Flight Computer
entry.content:
This is a simulation of the E6B flight computer.
;
;Assets from https://mediafiles.aero.und.edu/aero.und.edu/aviation/trainers/e6b/
;
;Source code available at https://github.com/j05t/e6b
entry.summary: E6B Flight Computer

entry.title: Chance
entry.content:
• Tap the side of a dice to change almost every facet - colour; text; image (SVG); # of sides
;• Clone dice to create new dice
;• Configure roll behaviour
;• Choose which dice to roll
;• Settings to control what is displayed
;• Import & export - create dice bags for different scenarios
;• User feedback drives development
;
entry.summary: Create custom dice - give meaning to chance

entry.title: Vape Tools
entry.content:
Key Features:
;- Coil Calculator: Easily calculate the optimal resistance for your coils. Choose your wire type, gauge, and number of wraps to get precise results tailored to your vaping style.
;- E-Liquid Mixer: Create your own custom e-liquids with precision. Input your desired nicotine strength, VG/PG ratio, and flavor percentages, and Vape Tools will generate the exact recipe you need.
;- Saved Liquids: Keep track of your e-liquid creations with the Saved Liquids feature. Save your recipes and monitor their steeping time for the perfect vape every time.
;- Ohmâ€™s Law Calculator: Ensure your builds are safe and efficient with the integrated Ohmâ€™s Law calculator. Input your voltage, resistance, or current to get accurate results in seconds.
;- No Data Collection: Vape Tools respects your privacy.
;
entry.summary: Coil and e-liquid tools.

entry.title: Write On: Simple Notepad
entry.content:
Write On: Simple Notepad - is a beautifully designed note-taking app that helps you capture your thoughts, ideas, and inspirations in a clean, distraction-free environment. With a focus on simplicity and usability, Write On offers customizable themes that adapt to your preferences, ensuring a comfortable writing experience whether you prefer light or dark modes.
;
;A minimalistic note-taking app with Material You design to create a visually attractive interface.
;
;ğŸ” Key features include:
;
;â˜… Biometric Authentication: Secure your notes with biometric authentication, keeping your data safe and private.
;â˜… Zero Permissions Required: Enjoy peace of mind knowing that Write On doesn't require unnecessary permissions.
;â˜… Backup/Restore: Easily back up your notes and restore them whenever needed.
;â˜… Automatic Backup: Ensure your notes are always safe with automatic backup options.
;â˜… Screen Protection: Protect your notes from prying eyes with screen protection features.
;â˜… Markdown Support: Format your notes effortlessly with Markdown, allowing you to create rich text notes with ease.
;â˜… Customizable Themes: Choose from a variety of themes to match your style, with options designed to be easy on the eyes.
;â˜… Intuitive UI: A user-friendly interface that keeps your notes organized and accessible.
;â˜… Offline Functionality: Keep your notes with you, even without an internet connection. Basically ad-free & clutter-free.
;â˜… Data Privacy: Your notes are stored securely on your device, ensuring your personal information remains private.
;
;Whether you're jotting down quick thoughts or crafting detailed notes, Write On is the perfect companion for staying organized and creative. Download now and experience note-taking like never before!
;
;Open-Source Code: https://github.com/3zpnix/WriteOn
;
entry.summary: A clean, intuitive note-taking open source app - Safe and Secure

entry.title: EnforceDoze
entry.content:
**EnforceDoze** allows you to forcefully enable Doze right after you turn off your
;screen, and on top of that, it also disables motion sensors so Doze stays active
;even if your device is not stationary while screen off. Doze will only deactivate
;periodically to execute maintenance jobs (like getting notifications, etc),
;otherwise it will remain active as long as your screen is off. This brings a lot
;more battery savings than standard Doze functionality, because even with screen
;off and Doze enabled, Doze is still periodically checking for movement, and
;disabling motion sensing improves battery life further.
;
;**Features**
;
;* Force Doze mode immediately after screen off or after a user specified delay
;* Add/remove apps or packages directly to system Doze whitelist
;* Disable motion sensors to prevent Doze from kicking in during movement
;* Tasker support to turn on/off EnforceDoze and modify other features
;* Disable WiFi and mobile data completely during Doze
;* Ignore disabling Wifi/Data if music is playing
;* Ignore disabling Wifi/Data if hotspot is enabled
;* Enable Doze mode on devices where OEM has disabled it
;* No root mode so you can enjoy the core benefits without rooting your device
entry.summary: Enable Doze mode immediately after screen off and turn off motion sensing

entry.title: Ruam Mij
entry.content:
An app for scanning suspicious apps on devices that can be risks to users in various aspects, such as apps installed from unsafe sources or misuse of Accessibility Service, and so on.
;
;Our app prioritizes user privacy, which is why we've designed it to work primarily offline, with no internet connection required. All functions of this app are under the control of the user.
entry.summary: Suspicious app scanner with privacy respects

entry.title: ArcaneChat
entry.content:
ArcaneChat is a decentralized and secure messenger app that is
;completely compatible with the existing e-mail infrastructure.
;
;Some features at a glance:
;
;ğŸ’¬ Reliable instant messaging with multi-profile and multi-device support.
;
;âš¡ï¸ Sign-up easily using secure fast chatmail servers. You donâ€™t need a phone number or any private data.
;
;ğŸ“§ Alternatively, use your existing classic e-mail address to read your inbox as chats.
;
;ğŸ® Interactive mini-apps in chats for gaming and collaboration.
;
;ğŸ”’ Audited end-to-end encryption safe against network and server attacks.
;
;ArcaneChat is a Delta Chat client and was created with a focus on usability,
;good user experience, and saving data plan. Also the app usually experiments with
;new features that eventually might get added to the official Delta Chat client.
;
;;Main differences with official Delta Chat client:;
;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Basic markdown support (bold, italic, strike, etc.)
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Support for displaying Telegram's animated stickers (.tgs files)
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Support for SVG images previews
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Multiple color themes/skins
    • ;
    ;
  • ;It is possible to enable/disable accounts
    • ;
    ;
  • ;A videochat instance is set by default
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Replies to your messages in muted groups trigger notifications
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Location streaming feature enabled by default and have extra option to share location for 12 hours
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Videos are played in loop, useful for short GIF videos
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Verified icon is shown in the chat list for the "Device Messages" chat
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Voice messages have more aggressive compression in "worse quality" mode to save data plan
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Automatic download of messages limited to 640KB by default
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Account's display name is shown in the app's title bar instead of the name of the app
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Your avatar is visible to other users in Mailing Lists
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Can be selected as app to open .xdc files
    • ;
    ;
  • ;For mini-apps developers: there are some differences in the WebXDC API, check https://github.com/ArcaneChat/android/#webxdc
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Better settings organization with additional "Privacy" section
    • ;
    ;
;
;
entry.summary: âš¡ Fast encrypted chats for the family ğŸ‰

entry.title: Valentin's PowerTools #036 - Ease The Waiting
entry.content:
Welcome to Ease The Waiting. This app is designed to ease the waiting for scheduled events in the future, such as special holidays, your birthday, or anything else. ğŸ‰ğŸ‚ğŸŒ´
;It displays the number of days until the event and (optionally) a personal background image for each event.
;
;;How it works:;
;
;* Just tap the big red button ("Add Event") to add your first event.
;* In the next screen:
; * Enter title and date
; * Optionally, choose a custom background image for this event by tapping the preview field beneath title and date. ğŸ“ğŸ—“ï¸ğŸ–¼ï¸
; * Save event by tapping the big red button that says "Save".
;* You will now be back on the main screen and see your event
;* To add more events, either tap the "+" sign in the bottom left, or scroll to the bottom of the event list and tap the "Add New Event" button.
;* For a visually appealing experience like in the screenshots, use attractive images!
;
;;Features:;
;
;* ğŸ”¤ ;2 visual presets; - Switch between big and small text modes by tapping the A, resp. B button next to the "+" button in the bottom line.
;* âœï¸ ;Edit existing events; - Tap on an event to modify its details.
;* ğŸ”´ ;Live preview; - See how your event will look as you add or edit it.
;* ğŸš€ ;Simple introduction; - The app provides clear instructions if no events are added.
;
;Created with â¤ï¸ by Valentin.
;
entry.summary: A mix between a calendar and a clock that makes you wait faster.

entry.title: Valentin's PowerTools #012 - Rate Your Pics
entry.content:
Welcome to Rate Your Pics, an app that allows you to rate your pictures very quickly.
;
;;How it works:;
;
;* Tap the big red button ("Select Folder") to select a folder
;* You start rating the pictures with the buttons from â˜…â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜† to â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…
;* the files get renamed as you rate
;* â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜† moves the picture to trash (undo possible during session).
;* forward and backward buttons go forward and backward in the preview. That way you can change your rating or skip rating a picture.
;
;;Features:;
;
;* â­ ;Rating Overlay; - Hold any picture for half a second to toggle overlay mode. In this mode, your rating is displayed over the picture for one-sixth of a second after each rating. You can disable this feature for faster rating.
;* ğŸ—‘ï¸ ;Delete 0 Star Pictures; - 0 Star Pictures are only deleted when you pause the app, close it, or press the button that takes you to the welcome screen. Until then, you can undo the ratings.
;* â˜• ;Contemplative Loading; - Our state-of-the-art image loading process takes just long enough for you to ponder the meaning of life, the universe, and everything. It's the perfect opportunity to grab a cup of ;coffee; tea, contemplate your existence, or practice your patience. We believe in turning waiting time into quality time!
;
;Created with â¤ï¸ by Valentin.
;
entry.summary: Rate your pictures very quickly.

entry.title: Tranquil Stopwatch
entry.content:
Tranquil Stopwatch is a reliable stopwatch designed for extended use with minimal power consumption. It is particularly well-suited for non-interactive sessions, such as meditation or long periods where you cannot actively interact with your device but still need to track elapsed time and know the current time.
;
;**Key Features:**
;
;- **Power Efficiency**: Optimized for long-duration use, with a black AMOLED-friendly screen and no milliseconds display to minimize power consumption.
;- **Reliability**: Ensures accurate timing without deviations, even during extended periods of use.
;- **Simple Operation**: Easily pause, resume, and reset the timer; no additional features like laps.
;- **Current Clock Display**: Shows the current time in addition to the stopwatch, perfect for sessions where constant interaction is not possible.
;- **No Disruptions**: The app does not interrupt you with advertisements, review requests, or other prompts, ensuring a smooth and distraction-free experience.
;
entry.summary: Stopwatch with current time display for long, non-interactive sessions.

entry.title: Twili Recipes
entry.content:
AI powered cooking assistant with Next Cloud integration.
;Easily add any recipe with the help of ChatGPT. Simply copy it from any page on the internet or type it manually. Recipes in all languages are supported.
;Recipes can be stored locally or in Next Cloud instance.
;Unique UI makes it easy to scale recipes and follow instructions.
;App is available for Android and Desktop. You can download version for other platforms from my website.
;
entry.summary: Recipe manager and cooking assistant app with ChatGTP and Next Cloud integration

entry.title: DevQS
entry.content:
Tired of banking and other financial apps whining that Developer Options is on? With ;DevQS;, Developer Options can be toggled off then back on from the Quick Settings panel without resetting other settings. Long-clicking on any of the tiles will also open the Developer Options settings screen if the DEV toggle is on.
;
;IMPORTANT:
;There is no launcher icon nor activity. The tiles must be manually added to the Quick Settings panel. The app requires the permission WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS which can be granted using ADB.
;
;;adb shell pm grant me.velc.devqs android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS;
;
entry.summary: Quick Settings tiles for developers

entry.title: Wire â€¢ Secure Messenger
entry.content:
Wire is the most secure collaboration platform. We increase the productivity in your team while keeping your information private. Wire allows your team to communicate and share information easily and securely - messages, files, conference calls or private conversations - always in context.
;
;â€“ Communicate with your teams through private or group conversations
;â€“ Share and collaborate with files, documents, links with reactions
;â€“ Press the one-click conference call button and your voice or video meetings starts on time
;â€“ Invite partners, customers and suppliers to collaborate through the unique guest rooms
;â€“ Increase privacy through ephemeral messages and device fingerprinting
;â€“ Integrate Wire with your corporate applications and services
;â€“ Recognized by IDC as industry leading security and privacy approach through Open Source, end to end encryption, forward secrecy and public audits
;
;Wire is available on any device and operating system - so your team can collaborate whether in the office or on the road.
;
;Wire is also available as an on-demand solution for crisis collaboration.
;
;Wire offers a free version for external business partners or friends and family use.
;
;To learn more go to wire.com
;
entry.summary: Wire offers highly secure communication â€“ anywhere and anytime.

entry.title: WhatSave
entry.content:
A simple app with Material 3 UI that helps you save WA statuses in the easiest way, along with other cool features:
;
;* Supports all Android versions starting from 7.0 Nougat
;* Material You on Android 12+
;* Preview and save files
;* Recover deleted messages
;* Night mode
;* Black theme
;* No ADs
;* No watermark
;* It's free!
;
entry.summary: An application that helps you save WA statuses

entry.content:
ä½“éªŒæˆ‘ä»¬ç²¾ç¾è®¾è®¡çš„åº”ç”¨ï¼Œäº«å—ç»ˆæè®¡ç®—ä½“éªŒã€‚æ‹¥æœ‰60å¤šç§ç»šä¸½çš„è‰²å½©ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå®Œç¾é€‚é…ä½ çš„ä¸ªäººé£æ ¼ã€‚æ— è®ºæ˜¯å¤æ‚çš„ç§‘å­¦æ–¹ç¨‹è¿˜æ˜¯ç®€å•çš„æ—¥å¸¸è®¡ç®—ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æé«˜çš„å¼ºå¤§è€Œå‹å¥½çš„ç•Œé¢éƒ½èƒ½è½»æ¾åº”å¯¹ã€‚

entry.title: Valentin's PowerTools #016 - Tomato Potato Clock
entry.content:
Welcome to Tomato Potato Clock. This is a classic pomodoro timer (this version: distraction-free). Right now: Alternating sections of 25 and 5 minutes - running in perpetuity (till stop/close app).
;If you found this app, you know what kind of person you are ;). Hence, there no options at all and you also cannot pause the timer. This is part of the design of this app. Good luck with your endeavours.
;
;;Features;
;
;- âš« Distraction-free: No status or navigation bar, no numbers, no letters - just visual and acoustic feedback of time.
;- ğŸ¶ Sounds: A sound is played each time a new slice/section begins.
;
;Gifted to you by Valentin â¤ï¸
;
;Tags: Pomodoro timer, procrastination, student, learning, studying, productivity, 'lofi hip hop radio ğŸ“š - beats to relax/study to', work, code, do boring but necessary stuff, paper work, time blindness, special needs, minimal design, one button app
;
;
;
entry.summary: Distraction-free pomodoro timer

entry.title: OGN AR Viewer
entry.content:
Discover aircraft around you with OGN AR Viewer, an experimental privacy-friendly augmented reality client to the OGN (Open Glider Network). Keep a private directory of the aircraft that belong to your club or friends and see how far they are. For free and without advertisements.
;
;Privacy note: the application needs to send your location to the OGN in order to listen for aircraft beacons around you and because the OGN doesnâ€™t support encryption, this happens in clear text. The good news is that OGN AR Viewer reduces the location accuracy to about 5 km before transmitting it and then restores it back on recipient, so the fine location never leaves your device. It further anonymizes you by connecting to the OGN without identification (other clients based on the official library generate an identifier based on your hostname). Check out the privacy policy to learn more (it is written in simple language and has illustrations).
entry.summary: Experimental augmented reality client to the Open Glider Network (OGN).

entry.title: mpvKt: MPV based media player
entry.content:
mpvKt is a front-end for the versatile media player mpv, built on the libmpv library. It aims to combine the powerful features of mpv with an easier-to-use interface and additional functionality.
;
; - Simpler and easier to use UI: Designed to make navigation and playback smoother, especially for those who want a straightforward media player experience.
; - Advanced Configuration and Scripting: Offers the full capabilities of mpv's scripting and configuration for users who want to customize their playback
; - Picture-in-Picture (PiP): Continue watching videos while using other apps.
; - Multi-Modal Controls: Includes customizable gestures for controlling volume, brightness, and playback, along with Keyboard input support.
;
;mpvKt aims to enhance the mpv experience by making it more accessible while retaining its flexibility and powerful playback capabilities.
entry.summary: A media player based on the popular commandline media player mpv.

entry.title: Recording Studio Lite
entry.content:
Audio recorder
;* Supports various formats and codecs
;* Recordings playback, renaming and deleting
;* Auto-pausing recordings on phone call, low battery or storage
entry.summary: Audio recorder

entry.title: Linkora
entry.content:
Linkora is your no-nonsense solution for link organization on Android. Whether you're saving a single link or categorizing them into folders, Linkora handles it all with unmatched simplicity.
;
;Features:
;
;- Save links effortlessly.
;- Organize links into folders for a cleaner view.
;- Create subfolders for detailed organization.
;- Mark links as important for quick access.
;- Archive old links or folders to keep your space clutter-free.
;- Customize link names to fit your needs.
;- Share links seamlessly from other apps.
;- Quickly find and sort through your links and folders.
;- Import and export your data.
;- Linkora automatically recognizes images and titles when available.
;- Customize your home screen by adding any folders you want to the Shelf, making accessing the most important ones easy.
entry.summary: the only link utility app you need for Android.

entry.title: Cavity
entry.content:
Cavity is a wine cellar manager for Android.
;
;A stock management app for wine cellars, that lets you always pick the right bottle at the right time.
;
;Features:
;Stock management
;Highlights peaking bottles
;Stock history
;Handle friends (Give a bottle to someone, share with a friend...)
;Buy & consumptions stats
;Search
;Tasting sessions: decanting notification, chill a bottle
;Auto online backups (optionnal: requires an account)
;
entry.summary: Wine cellar manager for Android

entry.title: Journalize
entry.content:
;Features

;
;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Renders in Markdown (images included)
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Automatic pseudo-Markdown rendering
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Automatically generates the next starting character in lists
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Import, export, and share
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Supports geo-stamping of entries
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Custom tags for the entries
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Browse entries
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Search entries based on content and tags
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Quickly open previous entry
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Automatically open new entry after reopening app after custom duration
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Black and White mode, both in greyscale
    • ;
    ;
;
;
entry.summary: A fast to use journaling app

entry.title: Arx Libertatis
entry.content:
This is unofficial Arx Libertatis android port. Arx Libertatis is an improved, cross-platform and open source engine for Arx Fatalis,
; a 2002 first-person role-playing game / dungeon crawler / immersive sim developed by Arkane Studios.
entry.summary: Android port of Arx Libertatis

entry.title: Ion Launcher
entry.content:
;Small;: The launcher is made to take up as little space as possible (within reason)
;
;;Unobtrusive;: Elements are arranged in an optimal way for muscle memory and reachability
;
;;Productive;: The launcher shows you relevant information on the home screen when its needed
;
;;Elegant;: The design does not take a back seat in this launcher, the default setup looks great, and you can make it look even better with a couple adjustments
;
entry.summary: A beautiful, functional and customizable launcher

entry.title: Code Rain Wallpaper
entry.content:
This wallpaper shows a bunch of falling sitelen pona characters, you can adjust the background, foreground, accent & glow colors.
;
;The font used is from https://github.com/ETBCOR/nasin-nanpa
;
entry.summary: A live wallpaper inspired by the matrix falling code effect

entry.title: Mensinator
entry.content:
; Mensinator

;
;Mensinator is the ultimate period tracker designed for those who prioritize simplicity, privacy, and user-friendliness. ğŸŒŸ
;
;

; Overview

;
;Mensinator provides a clean and intuitive interface for tracking your menstrual cycle, monitoring your periods, and viewing essential statisticsâ€”all without the need for sign-ups or sharing personal data. All information is stored securely on your device, ensuring your privacy is always protected. ğŸ›¡ï¸
;
;

; Key Features

;
;- Effortless Period Tracking: Easily mark your periods, view your cycle, and access statistics all in one place. ğŸ“…
;- No Sign-Up Required: Start using the app immediatelyâ€”no account creation or personal information required. ğŸ‰
;- Complete Privacy: Your data is stored locally on your device. We do not collect, share, or sell any personal information. ğŸ”’
;- Easy Navigation: Quickly switch between months and track your cycle with just a few taps. ğŸ–ï¸
;- Clear Statistics: Instantly view your average cycle length, average period length, and next period prediction right below your calendar. ğŸ“Š
;- Historical Insights: Get a summary of all your tracked periods to better understand your menstrual health over time. ğŸ“ˆ
;- Visual Indicators: See visual indicators on the calendar for existing periods and selected dates. ğŸ”´ğŸ”µ
;- Customizable Colors: Personalize the app's appearance by customizing colors to your preference. ğŸ¨
;- Export and Import Data: Easily export your data to a JSON file for backup or transfer and import it back into the app whenever needed. ğŸ“‚
;- Why Choose Mensinator?
;- Mensinator stands out for its simplicity and dedication to privacy. With just one main view, you can track your periods, view statistics, and manage your menstrual health without any complications. The app does not require sign-ups or collect personal data, providing an effective and private way to keep track of your cycle.
;
;

; How It Works

;
;- Track Your Periods: Select dates on the calendar to mark your periods and monitor your cycle.
;- View Statistics: Check your average cycle length, average period length, and next period prediction effortlessly.
;- Save and Refresh: Click the "Save" button to update your data and refresh your statistics.
;- Export and Import Data: Use the export feature to save your data as a JSON file and the import feature to load data back into the app.
;
;

; Who Should Use It?

;
;Mensinator is perfect for anyone seeking a straightforward and private period tracking solution. Whether you're tracking for health reasons or simply keeping an eye on your cycle, Mensinator makes it easy and secure.
;
;

; Getting Started

;
;To get started with Mensinator, you can either get it from IzzyOnDroid or from GooglePlay and start tracking your menstrual cycle with ease and privacy.
;;;https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mensinator.app;;
;;;;
;
;

; License

;
;This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details.
;
entry.summary: Tailored Period Tracking, Total Privacyâ€”Your Period, Your Control.

entry.title: Citrine
entry.content: Citrine is a nostr relay for android. It allows any nostr client that supports Android to send and receive events from this application.
entry.summary: Nostr relay for Android

entry.title: Image Meta Cleaner
entry.content: Image Meta Cleaner is a cross-platform application designed to remove metadata from images, ensuring user privacy and security. Metadata often contains sensitive information such as geolocation, device information, and timestamps. By removing this metadata, Image Meta Cleaner helps users protect their privacy when sharing images online.
entry.summary: a cross-platform application designed to Show and Remove metadata from images

entry.title: YAM Launcher
entry.content:
YAM (Yet Another Minimalist) Launcher is a minimalist text-based launcher for Android with weather integration.
;
;Key features:
;
;- No flashy effects, icons or other distractions. Perfect for digital minimalism.
;- Customizable shortcuts for your most used apps.
;- Weather integration with Open-Meteo. (optional)
;- Work profile support.
;- Search on the bottom of the screen.
;- System fonts for an uniform look with your Android.
;- Material You support.
;- Simple by default, customizable under the hood.
;- Accessibility Actions support.
;- Open-source under the MIT License.
entry.summary: YAM Launcher is a minimalist text-based launcher for Android with weather!

entry.title: FadCam
entry.content:
;FadCam is a feature-rich video recording app that allows seamless background video recording, even with the screen off!

;

;;What's New:;

;
    ;
  • ;Completely redesigned UI for a fresh look and feel.
    • ;
  • ;Internal storage for videos with option to save to gallery.
    • ;
  • ;Enhanced playback with ExoPlayer integration.
    • ;
  • ;Dynamic watermarks with options for timestamp, logo, and location data.
    • ;
  • ;Real-time storage updates and customizable clock widget.
    • ;
  • ;Video quality selection (SD, HD, FHD) and video renaming feature.
    • ;
;
entry.summary: Seamless background video recording â€“ ad-free, with customizable options.

entry.title: Click Switch
entry.content:
My app is based on a game where you have to give the written color not the text color, it consists of four buttons that can be exchanged between three color palettes, one being the main one.
;
;- Easy mode:
;In this mode you will only have to hit the correct button, if you hit it correctly you will get a point and if you don't hit it correctly and your score is higher than your previous record you will have a new redord.
;
;- Hard mode:
;The difficult mode is the same as the easy mode with the difference that you will have a Dialog to choose the amount of time you want between 15, 30 and 60 seconds.
;
;- Crazy mode:
;This mode is the same as the easy mode but the order of the buttons varies randomly each time you score a point.
;
;- Characteristics:
;
;The game is in Spanish and English, you can activate or deactivate the sound of the buttons and you have a Spinner to choose which colors you want to play with.
;
;
;- Additional features:
;There is a wifi indicator and a webView where you can browse Google in case you have any questions and don't want to leave the game.
entry.summary: A game where you will have to hit the correct button.

entry.title: Cardabase
entry.content:
Cardabase is an app that lets you save EAN-13 club cards on your phone and use them later.
;
;Features:
;- Light/dark mode toggle
;- Modern look
;- Light, fast and smooth
;- Encrypted storage
;- Simple and user-friendly
;
;Acknowledgments:
;By downloading the app you agree:
;- To accept the MIT license;
;- That the owner, creators, and contributors are not responsible for any hardware, software, emotional, or other damages made by the app. Download and use on your own risk;
;- To allow Cardabase use local storage (and camera - optional).
entry.summary: Cardabase is an app that lets you save EAN-13 club cards on your phone.

entry.title: gttrpg
entry.content:
Import your DMV data and quickly search through it on your own device.
;
;Track your characters, monsters, NPCs, world stats and more.
;
;Keep or move your data to another device by exporting and importing it.
;
;Fore more detailed info, check out the following page: https://github.com/feko006/generictabletoprpg
entry.summary: Quick access for your DnD data with a built in way to track your character data.

entry.title: Solar
entry.content:
Solar is an app to monitor off grid solar setups over bluetooth.
;
;It supports simultaneous monitoring of the battery and solar charger. When both devices are connected it can calculate the inverter power.
;
;Unlike the OEM app it does not require fine location access and does not have internet permission.
;
;Currently only the Junctek KH-F battery monitor (KH110F/KH140F/KH160F) and Ruijing 60A MPPT solar charger (sold under various brands like LiTime, HQST, etc.) are supported.
;
;Features:
;- Real time voltage, current, power, and energy readings
;- Live plotting of power readings of the charger, battery, and inverter
;- Reading history from the solar charger
;
;
entry.summary: Solar is an app to monitor off grid solar setups over bluetooth.
